title: SK but it's actually an army

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Stab someone at night.
- Send out your living soldiers to stab someone at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have [# of Players]/4 (rounded down) soldiers at the start of the game.
- You can command all of them to attack different people at the same time you attack someone.
- If you die, you don't. A soldier dies in your place instead. The soldiers all have Basic defense. Yes, this applies to being hanged too.
- If you don't have soldiers, and die, you die. (You're dead)
- Roleblock immune. Additionally, if you are roleblocked, you may have all of your soldiers stab the roleblocker all at once.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
https://discord.com/channels/970041597590929519/970051770342588467/1019361724572389387
> Eliminate absolutely everyone, including Neutrals who would otherwise assist you.
